snippet: A federal judge said Monday that he will not attempt to block a Texas law requiring women to have a sonogram before having an abortion.
abstract: Federal District Court Judge Sam Sparks says that he will not attempt to block a Texas law requiring women to have a sonogram before having an abortion.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge said Monday that he will not attempt to block a Texas law requiring women to have a sonogram before having an abortion.

headline.main: Texas: Judge Won’t Block Abortion Restrictions
headline.print_headline: Texas: Judge Won’t Block Abortion Restrictions
